name: lncnbd

body.origin:
|- wceq(cin(clo, ccop), cbo)
-| wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(clo, ccop)), wcel(cv(hs0), cbo))
-| diffsc(hs0, cin(clo, ccop))
-| diffsc(hs0, cbo)
body.pretty:
⊢ (LinOp ⋂ ContOp)= BndLinOp
⊣ (hs0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp)↔ hs0 ∈ BndLinOp)
⊣ d(hs0,(LinOp ⋂ ContOp))
⊣ d(hs0, BndLinOp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cin(clo, ccop), cbo)
-| wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(clo, ccop)), wcel(cv(hs0), cbo))
-| diffsc(hs0, cin(clo, ccop))
-| diffsc(hs0, cbo)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (LinOp ⋂ ContOp)= BndLinOp
⊣ (hs0 ∈(LinOp ⋂ ContOp)↔ hs0 ∈ BndLinOp)
⊣ d(hs0,(LinOp ⋂ ContOp))
⊣ d(hs0, BndLinOp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cin(clo, ccop), cbo)
-| diffsc(hs0, cin(clo, ccop))
-| diffsc(hs0, cbo)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (LinOp ⋂ ContOp)= BndLinOp
⊣ d(hs0,(LinOp ⋂ ContOp))
⊣ d(hs0, BndLinOp)

comment: A continuous linear operator is a bounded linear operator. (Contributed by NM, 18-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
